RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 1 1 1/16M Inner turf CR: 79. Maiden Special Weight Purse 136500. INNER TURF (PURSE $105,000 FOR NON-NYB) (UP TO $23,751 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred). (Rail at 9 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GOLD LIGHTNING broke in at the start brushing GOLDEN GHOST, tracked just off the inside from near the rear, got let out spinning three wide into upper stretch, tipped out a path a furlong out, rallied to take command a sixteenth from home, edged away under a drive to prevail. POSITIVE CARRY (IRE) tracked the pace along the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, kicked on belatedly to secure the place honors. SASSY PRINCESS three then two wide through the first turn, chased four paths off the inside down the backstretch and then just off the inside through the far turn coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, rallied to take command inside the eighth pole, got collared a sixteenth out and kept on to preserve the show honors. DEEP CONVICTION (IRE) three then two wide in pursuit, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled four wide into upper stretch, offered up a bid, then weakened in the late stages. GOLDEN GHOST (GB) got brushed at the start by GOLD LIGHTNING, showed the way in hand two to three wide, tucked inside at the seven-sixteenths, came under coaxing near the quarter pole and took the inside route into upper stretch, dug in under threat and was caught a furlong out, weakened in the late going. DAY AWAY three wide in pursuit, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled five wide into upper stretch, weakened in the late stages. KINGDOM COME just off the pace tracking just off the inside, tucked inside at the seven-sixteenths, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three wide into upper stretch and weakened in the late going. MULIMA saved ground near the rear, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and made no impact. BROUGHTY FERRY sluggish from the gate, chased with short strides early on bobbling twice before heading into the first turn, got placed to a protective hold and was guided outside continuing briefly into the backstretch before being able to be pulled up near the five eighths marker, then got walked off to the main track by outrider pony before being vanned off.

ENTRY.NAME: Positive Carry (IRE)
ENTRY.OWNER: Dubb Michael Madaket Stables LLC Kisber Michael E and Rucker William J
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked inside, coaxed 5/16, 2w 1/4p, belatedly

ENTRY.NAME: Golden Ghost (GB)
ENTRY.COMMENT: brushed st, in hand 2-3w, to ins 7/16, ins 1/4, caught, wknd late

ENTRY.NAME: Gold Lightning
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in st, tracked 2p, let out 3w upper, up 1/16, edged away

ENTRY.NAME: Deep Conviction (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3-2w, coaxed 5/16, angled 4w upper, bid, wknd late

ENTRY.NAME: Day Away
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w pursuit, coaxed 5/16, angled 5w upper, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Kingdom Come
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 2p, to ins 7/16, coaxed 5/16, 3w upper, wknd late

ENTRY.NAME: Broughty Ferry
ENTRY.COMMENT: sluggish st, short strides, protected, pulled up 5/8, vanned off

ENTRY.NAME: Mulima
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved grd near rear, coaxed 3/8, 2w 1/4p, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Sassy Princess
ENTRY.OWNER: America's Pastime Stables and Bloom Racing Stable LLC (Jeffrey Bloom)
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3-2w 1st turn, chased 4-2w, 2w 1/4p, up ins 1/8, caught, kept on

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 79. Maiden Special Weight Purse 136500. (PURSE $105,000 FOR NON-NYB) (UP TO $23,751 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LIFE TALK settled along the rail while inside of foes, was eased back outside the five-eighths pole then moved out, went three wide while behind horses early on the far turn, nudged DOROTHY'S DREAM out of the way at the three-eighths and shifted to the four path, rallied outside coming to the quarter-pole, closed fast to get the lead into upper stretch, drifted in significantly while moved clear near the three-sixteenths, came under a left-handed crop while drawing away at the eighth-pole, lugged in under extra right-rein pressure in the final furlong and was eased up late while much the best. BACKSTRETCH ROSE raced in the three path on the first turn, was well placed just off the pace, chased in the three path on the far turn, turned into upper stretch under a drive and willingly earned the place while no match for the winner. RISING INFLATION was re-positioned in the gate, broke in at the start, went to the front then showed the way in the two path going around the first turn, lost the lead inside the three-quarter pole then prompted on the inside, dropped back late on the backstretch, chased inside on the far turn and missed the place while clear for the show. PARADISE LANE traveled in the four path on the first turn, moved to the lead inside the three-quarter pole, vied in the two path on the far turn, lost the advantage under urging into upper stretch and weakened. UNDER THE PALMS was restless in the gate, stumbled at the start and was off a bit slow, angled in at the rear, rounded the first turn in the two path, settled well behind the rest of the field, was urged two then three wide on the far turn, angled five wide while gaining late on that bend, lugged inward in the stretch and failed to threaten. DOROTHY'S DREAMS was caught in the five path on the first turn, settled on the outside, came under encouragement late on the backstretch, was hard ridden while four wide early on the far turn then nudged to the five path by the winner at the three-eighths, dropped back to the four path later on that bend and came up empty.

ENTRY.NAME: Life Talk
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled inside,easd back5-1/2,mvd out,3-4w2nd,lead3/16,lug in,clr

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Gun Runner Syndicate, MulhollandSprings LLC & Tom Grether

ENTRY.NAME: Rising Inflation
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in,2p1st,pace ins foe,drop back 1/2,chsd rail2nd,missed 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Backstretch Rose
ENTRY.OWNER: C and H Diamond Racing LLC Mims Ted O and Menard David
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3p1st,well placed,chased 3p2nd turn,no match,willingly for 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Paradise Lane
ENTRY.OWNER: Bushnell Emily Bushnell Oliver Wygod Martin J and Wygod Pam
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4p1st,to front ins 3/4,outside,2p2nd,headed3/16,weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Dorothy's Dreams
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5p1st,settled outside,urged1/2,4-5w2nd,nudged3/8,came up empty

ENTRY.NAME: Under the Palms
ENTRY.COMMENT: restless gate,stumbled brk,bit slw,2-3p,5p1/4,lugged in,no threat

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 3 5 1/2F Turf CR: 87. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 100000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 TWICE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $45,000. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race In 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $45,000 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% Aftercare Assessment D ue At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at Five and One Half Furlongs on the Main Track). (Rail at 18 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LOON CRY tracked the pace along the inside patiently handled until roused spinning four then five wide into upper stretch, rallied under a light and brief drive to take command just inside the eighth pole, then edged away back in hand through the final sixteenth to prevail comfortably on the wire. ITSAKEYPER chased just off the inside coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, angled four wide into upper stretch, ran on to just secure the place honors in the final jump to the finish. ROAD TO REMEMBER broke out a step at the start bumping QUEENS DANCER, chased two to three wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three wide into upper stretch, ran on to secure the show honors. MASTEROF THE TUNES tracked the pace along the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, kept on to the finish but was out-finished in the late stages. MZ BIG BUCKS hustled from the gate, prompted the leader along the inside early on before being shaken off near the half mile pole, tipped to the two path with seven-sixteenths to go and advanced once more this time to the outside of the leader, came under coaxing near the quarter pole, continued just off the inside into upper stretch and weakened in the final furlong. QUEENS DANCER got bumped at the start by ROAD TO REMEMBER, who broke out a step, showed the way in hand just off the inside under some pressure early on from MZ BIG BUCKS to the inside, cleared that foe and tucked to the inside at the half mile pole, had that rival advance once more outside three furlongs from home, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, cut the corner into upper stretch, dug in clinging to command from a host of rivals a furlong out before being overhauled just inside that station and weakened through to the finish.

ENTRY.NAME: Loon Cry
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked ins, roused 4-5w upper, up ins 1/8, comfortably

ENTRY.NAME: Masterof the Tunes
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked inside, coaxed 5/16, 2w 1/4p, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Itsakeyper
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed near 1/4, 4w upper, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Mz Big Bucks
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled st, prompted ins early, 2p turn, 2w 1/4p, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Road to Remember
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out step st, chased 2-3w, coaxed 5/16, 3w upper, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Queens Dancer
ENTRY.OWNER: Dixon Linda K and Alejandro Hector M
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped st, in hand 2p, to ins 1/2, cut corner, collared, wknd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 4 7F Dirt CR: 84. Starter Allowance Purse 70000. (UP TO $12,180 NYSBFOA) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $50,000 OR LESS AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN OR CLAIMING. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CORNER KICK jostled with a foe entering the main-track, was well placed just off the pace, moved from the rail to the two path near the five-sixteenths, made a bid in the three to four path into upper stretch, took a short lead in the vicinity of the three-sixteenths, dueled outside of the runner-up under a right-handed crop to the finish and prevailed under strong urging. GIRL AFRAID broke out at the start, angled in while going to the front, showed the way down the backstretch, extended the advantage while inside to the two path on the turn, was given her cue coming to the quarter-pole, lost the advantage to the winner in upper stretch, dueled inside that foe under a left-handed crop to the finish and missed while well clear for the place. DIAMOND COLLECTOR was carried out at the start then bumped with a foe, tracked the pace on the inside of a rival, was asked in the three path on the turn, chased four wide into the stretch and weakened but earned the show. PROUD FOOT broke out and hit the gate, jostled with a foe entering the main-track, was rated off the pace, went three wide while let out some early on the turn, dropped to the two path while roused near the five-sixteenths, turned into upper stretch under a drive and lacked the needed response. FREUDIAN was bumped at start and forced out, settled on the outside, was roused five wide on the turn, came six wide into the stretch and failed to rally. MY GIRL JAL was reserved at the rear, moved out around the five-eighths pole, was asked near the nine-sixteenths, went five wide under urging on the turn, spun seven wide into the stretch and failed to threaten. BRISKY FROLIC jostled with foes on both sides entering the main-track, was rated off the pace, moved from the two path to the four path while roused on the turn, came six wide into the stretch and failed to respond. ICY REPLY settled off the pace, dropped back while inside on the turn and capitulated. SWEET HEIDELBERG hit the outside of the gate at the start, stalked the pace on the outside, was asked in the four path on the turn, dropped back five wide into the stretch and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Corner Kick
ENTRY.COMMENT: jostled6-1/2,well placed,ins-2p turn,3p1/4,bid,dueled out,prevail

ENTRY.NAME: Girl Afraid
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out,angled in,pace,ins-2path turn,headed3/16,dueled,missed

ENTRY.NAME: Freudian
ENTRY.OWNER: Beast Mode Racing LLC and Falcone Jr Robert N
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd brk,forced out,settled outside,ask 5w turn,6w1/4,no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Icy Reply
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled,dropped back rail turn,capitulated

ENTRY.NAME: My Girl Jal
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved,mvd out 5/8,ask4-1/2,urged 5w turn,7w1/4,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Brisky Frolic
ENTRY.COMMENT: jstld btwn6-1/2,rated,asked 2-4path turn,6p into lane,no response

ENTRY.NAME: Proud Foot
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out,hit gate,jstld 6-1/2,rated,let out 3-2p turn,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Diamond Collector
ENTRY.COMMENT: carried out brk,bmpd,tracked ins foe,ask 3p turn,chased,wknd

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Heidelberg
ENTRY.COMMENT: hit gate,stalked outside,ask 4p turn,5p1/4,empty

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 5 7F Dirt CR: 78. Maiden Claiming Purse 40000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DISAPPEARANCE got bumped at the start by NICKEL NICKEL, who broke outwards, chased three wide coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, tipped four wide near the five-sixteenths, went seven to eight wide into upper stretch, rallied to close in on the leader taking command near the sixteenth pole, then edged away late on to the finish to prevail. SCREAMING UNCLE chased five wide coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, tipped six wide into upper stretch, dug in under a drive running on to secure the place honors. BAD LARRY coaxed from the gate, raced forwardly placed early on before advancing to take command five furlongs out, showed the way along the inside in hand under pressure from the former leader SALINE RIVER to the outside, remained patiently handled until called upon spinning just off the inside into upper stretch, dug in under a drive under threat from a pair, got collared near the sixteenth marker and weakened in the late stages while clear for the show honors. WITH PURPOSE grew detached at the tail of the field chasing four wide down the backstretch, went five wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, cornered nine wide into upper stretch and passed tired rivals to the finish offering up a mild bid. TESTA DURA broke a beat slow, chased two to three wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung three wide into upper stretch, improved position to the finish. SALINE RIVER coaxed from the gate, showed the way early on five paths off the inside before being displaced five furlongs out, applied pressure to the new leader BAD LARRY to the outside, tucked three then two wide through the turn coming under coaxing near the five-sixteenths, swung three wide into upper stretch and tired. CHESS SPECTACULAR two to three wide in pursuit, got set down angled four wide into upper stretch, tired. FIRE BARON hustled from the gate, chased along the inside coming under coaxing three furlongs from home, cut the corner into upper stretch, tired. NIEUWENDYK struck the off side stall at the start, chased just off the inside coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and folded. NICKEL NICKEL broke out at the start bumping DISAPPEARANCE, chased three to four wide under a ride from the seven-sixteenths, angled five wide into upper stretch and faltered in the drive.

ENTRY.NAME: Fire Baron
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled st, chased ins, coaxed 3/8, cut corner, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Testa Dura
ENTRY.COMMENT: off beat slw, chased 2-3w, coaxed 3/8, 3w upper, improved

ENTRY.NAME: Bad Larry
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, up 5/8, in hand ins, 2w 1/4p, collared 1/16, wknd late

ENTRY.NAME: Chess Spectacular
ENTRY.OWNER: Four Corners Racing and Cory Moelis Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2-3w pursuit, set down angled 4w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Nieuwendyk
ENTRY.OWNER: McMahon Michael J Begg James Bentley Stavropoulos Tommy Siegel Bart Copper Beech
ENTRY.COMMENT: hit gate st, chased 2p, coaxed 7/16, 2w 1/4p, folded

ENTRY.NAME: Nickel Nickel
ENTRY.OWNER: Flying P Stable R A Hill Stable Rosedown Racing Stables LLC and Flying Partners
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, chased 3-4w, coaxed 7/16, 5w upper, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Disappearance
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped st, chased 3-4w, coaxed 7/16, 7-8w uppr, edged away

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Hidden Brook Farm & Blue Devil Racing

ENTRY.NAME: Saline River
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, led early, prompted 5w, 2p turn, 3w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: With Purpose
ENTRY.COMMENT: detached at rear 4w, 5w turn, 9w upper, passed tired foes

ENTRY.NAME: Screaming Uncle
ENTRY.OWNER: Louis Lazzinnaro LLC and Dubb Michael
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5w pursuit, coaxed 7/16, angled 6w upper, dug in, ran on

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 6 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 93. Claiming Purse 50000. (UP TO $8,700 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $35,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at Five and One Half Furlongs on the Main Track). (Rail at 18 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SPEAKINOFTHEDEVIL showed speed on the inside of a foe then dropped back near the nine-sixteenths, went three wide on the turn, was roused near the five-sixteenths, rallied four wide under a right-handed crop into the stretch, took the lead around the three-sixteenths, switched to a left-handed crop outside the eighth-pole and edged clear in the final furlong under steady urging. TIVY was sent hard from the outside post, showed speed then moved clear outside the half-mile pole, traveled around the turn in the two path, was asked near the quarter-pole, lost the advantage to the winner under a drive in upper stretch and was outfinished while clear for the place. DR. SETTLE'S DREAM showed speed then chased the pace, saved ground on the turn, was driven into the stretch in the two path and lacked the needed kick while well clear for the show. MOVING PICTURES brushed the outside of the gate at the start, was urged along on the outside, went four wide on the turn and lacked the needed response. WAR TERMINATOR lost footing at the start but was away towards the front, settled off the pace, was roused while two then three wide on the turn, came four wide into the stretch and failed to respond. MOON WATCH (IRE) broke a step slow, settled on the outside, was urged three wide on the turn and was no factor. CHARGING stumbled at the start while last away then checked, spotted the front many lengths, angled to the rail at the rear, moved out behind a foe leaving the backstretch, was urged along in the two path on the turn, angled out in upper stretch and failed to threaten. BRENNAN'S WAR had his saddle adjusted behind the gate, broke out and bumped with an opponent, settled off the pace, dropped to the rail at the seven-sixteenths, saved ground on the turn and failed to respond. MSHINDI bumped with a rival and was off a bit slow, was urged along at the rear, went three wide on the turn, came four wide into the stretch and trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Dr. Settle's Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed,chased,inside turn,2path into lane,no kick,clear show

ENTRY.NAME: Brennan's War
ENTRY.COMMENT: saddle adjusted,broke out,bmpd,settled,ins turn,no response

ENTRY.NAME: Mshindi
ENTRY.OWNER: Hart Sr William D and Benain Michael
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start,off bit slow,urged,3w turn,4w into lane,no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Charging
ENTRY.OWNER: LaPenta Robert V e Five Racing Thoroughbreds and Madaket Stables LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled brk,checked,2path turn,angled out,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Speakinofthedevil
ENTRY.OWNER: West Point Thoroughbreds Pine Racing Stables and Titletown Racing Stables
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed,drop back 4-1/2,3path turn,4w,took lead upper stretch,clear

ENTRY.NAME: Moon Watch (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow,settled outside,urged 3wide turn,no factor

ENTRY.NAME: War Terminator
ENTRY.COMMENT: lost footing start,settled,2-3p turn,4w1/4,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Moving Pictures
ENTRY.OWNER: Werner J Stable and Rodriguez Rudy R
ENTRY.COMMENT: brushed gate,urged outside,4wide turn,no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Tivy
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent hard,pace,clear1/2,2path turn,ask1/4,headed3/16,outfinished

RACE.RACE_TEXT: With Anticipation S. - Grade3 SARATOGA RACE 7 1 1/16M Inner turf CR: 83. Stakes Purse 175000. INNER TURF FOR TWO YEAR OLDS. Non-Lasix race pursuant to 4043.2 (7)(e)(5) Lasix not permitted within 48 hours of post time. By subscription of $175 each which should accompany the nomination; $875 to pass the entry box and an additional $875 to start. For horses not originally nominated, a supplemental payment of $875 in addition to the entry and starting fees may be made at any time prior to the closing of entries. The purse to be divided 55% to the winner, 20% to second, 12% to third, 6% to fourth, 4% t o fifth and 3% divided equally amongst the remaining finishers. Weight 122 lbs. Non-winners of a race on the turf other than claiming allowed 2 lbs.; maidens allowed 4 lbs. A trophy will be presented to the winning owner. The New York Racing Associationr eserves the right to transfer this race to the Main Track. In the event that this race is taken off the turf, it may be subject to downgrading upon review by the Graded Stakes Committee. Closed Saturday, August 19, 2023 with 16 Original Nominations and 11
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GALA BRAND just off the inside through the first turn unhurried and settling at the tail of the field, raced two to three wide in pursuit patiently handled until put to coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled out to swing eight wide at the top of the stretch, offered up a good kick to close outside rivals tussling head to head with the runner up before taking sole command seventy yards from home, then gamely edged away to the finish to prevail. CARSON'S RUN just off the inside through the first turn just off the pace, tracked three wide down the backstretch before tucking back to the two path through the far turn, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled out seven wide into upper stretch, rallied between foes taking narrow command just inside the eighth pole, dug in head to head with the aforementioned foe and was headed seventy yards from home, fought on gamely inside to secure the place honors. SPIRIT PRINCE forwardly placed along the inside into the first turn, settled tracking just off the inside from mid pack, came under coaxing nearing the quarter pole and swung five wide into upper stretch, rallied back into prominence a furlong out, ran on willingly to clearly procure the show honors while unable to match the top pair in the late stages. GET SPOOLED three wide through the first turn, raced two to three wide in pursuit, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung four wide into upper stretch, rallied to take command nearing the eighth pole, got overwhelmed and overhauled just inside that station and weakened in the late stages. NOMOS three then two wide through the first turn, chased three to four wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, cornered six wide into upper stretch and came up empty in the final furlong. WINE COLLECTOR tracked the pace along the inside coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, weakened in the drive. MARKET STREET established the front and showed the way in hand just off the inside through sensible splits, came under coaxing and angled inside near the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, dug in under threat and yielded outside the eighth pole, then weakened through to the finish.

ENTRY.NAME: Gala Brand
ENTRY.OWNER: Arnmore Thoroughbreds LLC and Even Keel Thoroughbreds LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2-3w pursuit, coaxed 5/16, angled 8w uppr, gd kick, gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Spirit Prince
ENTRY.OWNER: Oakwood Stables (Daniel J Burke) Krase Scott D Donarra Thoroughbreds LLC Beitz K
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed ins, tracked 2p, angled 5w upper, willingly

ENTRY.NAME: Wine Collector
ENTRY.OWNER: Lugamo Racing Stable LLC and Sanchez-Salomon Rodolfo
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked inside, coaxed near 1/4, 2w 1/4p, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Market Street
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand 2p, to ins coaxed 5/16, 2w 1/4p, yielded, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: dh-Get Spooled
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2-3w pursuit, coaxed 5/16, 4w uppr, up 1/8, overwhelmed, wknd lte

ENTRY.NAME: dh-Nomos
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3-2w 1st turn, chased 3-4w, angled 6w upper, empty

ENTRY.NAME: Carson's Run
ENTRY.OWNER: West Point Thoroughbreds and Bouchey Steven
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 3-2w, coaxed 5/16, 7w upper, up ins 1/8, fought game

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 8 1M Dirt CR: 93. Allowance Purse 95000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non -winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over Allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CICCIOBELLO went to the front, set the pace on the inside with company to his outside, responded well when asked near the quarter-pole, shook clear while asked for more into upper stretch, was put to a right-handed crop coming to the furlong marker, extended the advantage outside the sixteenth-pole and held under steady urging. BANK FRENZY angled out early, went four wide on the first turn, settled near the middle of the spread-out field on the outside, was urged four wide on the far turn, came five wide into the stretch, kept on well in pursuit of the winner in the final furlong, gained on that foe late and finished willingly for the place. PINEAPPLE MAN prompted the pace on the outside in the two path, was urged along late on the backstretch, vied in the two path on the far turn, dropped back into upper stretch and tired while able to get the show. G MUNNING went three wide on the first turn, tugged on the bit while rated on the outside, was let out then roused three wide on the far turn, moved closer in the process, turned into upper stretch under a drive, chased into the final furlong and weakened. LEFTEMBEHIND was carried out at the start, rounded the first turn in the three path, settled well off the pace, moved closer late on the backstretch, was urged while moving from the rail to the three path on the far turn and lacked the needed response. BOYS CODE lugged out some under extra left-rein pressure while five wide on the first turn, settled well off the pace on the outside, moved in late on the backstretch, chased two to three wide while under a bit of extra left-rein pressure on the far turn, was driven four wide into the stretch and came up empty. ACH DU LIEBER was away awkwardly, saved ground on the first turn, settled while last but one, was urged along passing the nine-sixteenths, went around the far turn in the two path and was no factor. DR. MARBOOZ drifted out at the start, raced in the two path on the first turn, lagged at the rear, saved ground on the far turn, turned into the stretch in the two path then moved out and failed to threaten.

ENTRY.NAME: Ach Du Lieber
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward brk,ins1st,well back,urged4-1/2,2p2nd,no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Bank Frenzy
ENTRY.COMMENT: angled out,4w1st,settled outside,urged 4w2nd,5w1/4,willingly

ENTRY.NAME: Cicciobello

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 9 7F Dirt CR: 94. Starter Allowance Purse 70000. (UP TO $12,180 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $50,000 OR LESS AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN OR CLAIMING. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race In 2023 Allow ed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LOCKE AND KEY got bumped at the start by INSPEIGHTOFTRAINER due to pressure from TENEBRIS breaking inwards, chased three to four wide patiently handled until set down angled eight wide into upper stretch, rallied to take command a furlong out, edged clear to the finish kept to task. GIROOVIN coaxed from the start, chased four to five wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, took over narrow command swinging five wide into upper stretch and bumped TENEBRIS straightened away, got collared a furlong out, ran on to safely preserve the place honors. KUNSHAN BRIDGE broke out at the start and brushed lightly with ICE ROAD, chased two to three wide coming under coaxing at the half mile pole, swung four wide into upper stretch and improved position to secure the show honors. TENEBRIS broke in at the start bumping INSPEIGHTOFTRAINER and then forced that rival to check off his heels, chased five to six wide coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, got bumped six wide into upper stretch by GIROOVIN, offered up a bid a furlong out, then weakened in the late stages. WINNING CONNECTION chased four wide coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, angled out eight wide into upper stretch and passed tired rivals to the finish. INSPEIGHTOFTRAINER got bumped at the start by TENEBRIS breaking inwards and then got forced to check off that rival conceding four to five lengths to the front before settling into stride, chased five wide coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, went seven wide into upper stretch and was one paced through to the finish. ARREBATO coaxed from the start, chased along the inside under coaxing from the half mile pole, swung three wide into upper stretch, tired. ICE ROAD broke out at the start bumping AMANI'S EAGLE, chased three wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, swung three wide into upper stretch heads apart for command, then tired in the drive. AMANI'S EAGLE got bumped at the start by ICE ROAD, who broke outwards, showed the way in hand coming under coaxing three furlongs from home, yielded the front nearing the quarter pole, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and faltered.

ENTRY.NAME: Arrebato
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased ins, coaxed 1/2, 3w upper, tired

ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 4w, coaxed 7/16, angled 8w uppr, passed tired foes

ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, chased 3w, coaxed 3/8, 3w upper, tired

ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped st, in hand 2p, coaxed 3/8, yielded, 2w 1/4p, faltered

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 10 1 1/16M Turf CR: 87. Claiming Purse 50000. INNER TURF (UP TO $8,700 NYSBFOA) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR THREE YEAR OLD FILLIES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claim ing Price $35,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void). (Rail at 9 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MORE MANGO traveled three wide on the first turn, settled on the outside without the benefit of cover, stayed tucked in the three path on the far turn, was roused for her best into upper stretch, chased the runner-up into the final furlong, gained into the final sixteenth and got up to prevail. MISS BONNIE T was fractious in the gate, went three wide on the first turn, was rated under a snug hold with cover, ranged up two then three wide on the far turn, was asked near the quarter-pole, rallied to the lead into upper stretch, led under the crop into the final sixteenth but was caught while able to get the place. RUSSIARUSSIARUSSIA was restless in the gate then hustled, angled in before the first turn, rounded that bend in the two path, was reserved near the back, moved from the two path to the four path on the far turn, pursued the leader while outside into the final sixteenth and finished willingly for the show. HOME FOR CHRISTMAS was hustled from the gate then taken in hand early, raced in the two path while rated off the pace, moved out while asked for her best in upper stretch and lacked the needed kick. CLARA BELLE was fractious in the gate, went around the first turn in the two path, settled off the pace, raced inside to the two path on the far turn, moved out in upper stretch and lacked the needed response. MISS M M went three wide on the first turn, stalked the pace on the outside, vied in the two path on the far turn, came under a drive in upper stretch, chased the leader into the final furlong and weakened. SYNONYMOUS was hustled from the gate, saved ground on the first turn, settled towards the rear, was urged two then three wide on the far turn and failed to threaten. LADY HAMILTON angled in while going to the front, rounded the first turn in the two path, showed the way down the backstretch, vied inside on the far turn, was headed into upper stretch and faded. REDZILLA was rated just off the pace on the inside, came under urging on the far turn, dropped back into the stretch and capitulated.

ENTRY.NAME: Redzilla
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated inside,asked 2nd turn,chased,came up empty

ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,rated 2path,moved out 3/16,lacked needed kick
